data.title: National Calligraphy Treasure
data.meta_description: Mifu Collection - National Calligraphy Treasure - 56 (Chinese Edition) by Sun Bao Wen - ISBN 10: 7532636844 - ISBN 13: 9787532636846 - Shanghai Lexicographical Publishing House - 2012 - Softcover
data.text:
Synopsis

The book is one of the series of ""National Calligraphy Treasure"". It is a four-color printing for the first time and engages the experts annotation. The collection includes Mifus nine representatives like ""Letter to Boxiu"", ""Jinzhi post"", ""Letter to Susi"", ""Huigan post"" and so on. It is stored in Taibei Palace Museum at present. The experts has verified that these works are finished in the year of Emperor Huizong of Song when the calligher is over 50 years old.

"synopsis" may belong to another edition of this title.
